SEARCH
Package project332

Class FacultyRules

java.lang.Object
project332.FacultyRules
public class FacultyRules extends Object
Represents rules specific to a faculty for managing resources like books, meeting rooms, and electronic resources. This class provides a flexible framework for configuring borrowing durations, maximum renewals, penalties for late returns, and rules for reserving and using library resources. The default rules can be customized to meet the needs of specific faculties.

    Constructs a FacultyRules object with default rule configurations.
